body_html:
Hi all,
i run trainning with translate.py follow to https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/seq2seq with 3 layer of 512 units, but perplexity alway increase follow as:
global step 104400 learning rate 0.2375 step-time 1.01 perplexity 1.00
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 52838.74
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 117227.88
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 445883.28
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 323676.55
global step 104600 learning rate 0.2375 step-time 1.03 perplexity 1.01
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 36887.39
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 826537.03
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 525378.90
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 304065.98
global step 104800 learning rate 0.2352 step-time 0.95 perplexity 1.00
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 27844.06
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 248171.42
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 550592.36
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 435554.41
I do not know why? Please help me, I can not bug this problem.

body:
Hi all,
i run trainning with translate.py follow to https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/seq2seq with 3 layer of 512 units, but perplexity alway increase follow as:
global step 104400 learning rate 0.2375 step-time 1.01 perplexity 1.00
  eval: bucket 0 perplexity 52838.74
  eval: bucket 1 perplexity 117227.88
  eval: bucket 2 perplexity 445883.28
  eval: bucket 3 perplexity 323676.55
global step 104600 learning rate 0.2375 step-time 1.03 perplexity 1.01
  eval: bucket 0 perplexity 36887.39
  eval: bucket 1 perplexity 826537.03
  eval: bucket 2 perplexity 525378.90
  eval: bucket 3 perplexity 304065.98
global step 104800 learning rate 0.2352 step-time 0.95 perplexity 1.00
  eval: bucket 0 perplexity 27844.06
  eval: bucket 1 perplexity 248171.42
  eval: bucket 2 perplexity 550592.36
  eval: bucket 3 perplexity 435554.41
I do not know why? Please help me, I can not bug this problem.
